title: 03/12/2021 - HOUR 1 - Bears, Wilson, Patriots
itunes:title: 03/12/2021 - HOUR 1 - Bears, Wilson, Patriots
description:
The Chicago Bears are rumored to be offering a lot for Russell Wilson

The New England Patriots are sticking with Cam Newton

Dynasties are difficult to make


Guest: Mark Schlereth

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
